front.title: IEEE Guide for Application of Composite Line Post Insulators

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: An application guide for non-ceramic line posts is being drafted. The guide will include handling recommendations, interpretation of manufacturer ratings, contamination considerations, and equivalency with porcelain. Project purpose: Users of non-ceramic line posts have questions regarding the use of the products which are not answered due to the lack of any official standard.
